In This Section
This section contains the following topics:
Topic
Topic Name
1
Processing of Herbicide Claims
2
Developing Claims Based on Exposure to Agent Orange for Select Air Force Personnel Through Contact With Contaminated C-123 Aircraft Used in the RVN as Part of Operation Ranch Hand (ORH)
3
Developing Claims Based on Herbicide Exposure on the Korean Demilitarized Zone (DMZ)
4
Developing Claims Based on Herbicide Exposure in Thailand
5
Developing Claims Based on Herbicide Exposure on Johnston Atoll
6
Developing Claims Based on Herbicide Exposure in Other Locations
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) Based on Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
